00028 void constructHgeRect(hgeRect* rect)
00029 {
00030     new (rect) hgeRect();
00031 }
00032 
00033 void constructHgeRect(hgeRect* rect, double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
00034 {
00035     new (rect) hgeRect(x1, -y1, x2, -y2);
00036 }

00082 bool pointInside(hgeRect* rect, double x, double y)
00083 {
00084     return rect->TestPoint(x, -y);

00087 bool intersects(hgeRect* rect1, hgeRect* rect2)
00088 {
00089     return rect1->Intersect(rect2);

00103 {
00104     return vec + vec2;

00109     return vec - vec2;

00123 {
00124     return vec1.Dot(&vec2);

00169     BLEND_ALPHA_ADD = BLEND_ALPHAADD;
00170     BLEND_ALPHA_BLEND = BLEND_ALPHABLEND;
00171     BLEND_COLOR_ADD = BLEND_COLORADD;
00172     BLEND_COLOR_MUL = BLEND_COLORMUL;

00177     int r = 0;

00186     r = engine->RegisterObjectType("Rect", sizeof(hgeRect), asOBJ_VALUE | asOBJ_POD | asOBJ_APP_CLASS_CA); //assert (r >= 0);
00187     r = engine->RegisterObjectMethod("Rect", "double left()", asFUNCTION(rectX1), asCALL_CDECL_OBJFIRST); assert (r >= 0);

00189     r = engine->RegisterObjectMethod("Rect", "double right()", asFUNCTION(rectX2), asCALL_CDECL_OBJFIRST); assert (r >= 0);

00191     r = engine->RegisterObjectMethod("Rect", "double top()", asFUNCTION(rectY1), asCALL_CDECL_OBJFIRST); assert (r >= 0);

00193     r = engine->RegisterObjectMethod("Rect", "double bottom()", asFUNCTION(rectY2), asCALL_CDECL_OBJFIRST); assert (r >= 0);
